main event: French commercial airline pilots reported encountering a strange luminous cloud and a white egg-shaped object on 7 Oct 52.
interesting points: The pilots experienced a continuous and brilliant luminous cloud that obscured their visibility,The observed object was estimated to travel at 3 times the speed of a jet,The pilots noted disturbances in their eyesight after the incident,Many witnesses besides the pilots corroborated seeing the object, The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds and was unusual for experienced pilots.
sighted object: a white egg-shaped object and a luminous cloud
witness description: Air France pilots Arnoul and Boumard
